Who am I ?

Hi, I am Atharva Sune. I am pursuing my bachelor's in Computer Science from BITS Pilani; right now in my final year.
I have always loved computers and the wonders we can do with them, create websites (like this), operating systems, applications, games,... there's just so much to do.
Recently I have developed a lot of interest in the field of artificial intelligence, machine learning and deep learning. (Not just coding, math too :D) I am very much interested in developing websites, applications leveraging AI to make some awesome products.

My Professional Experience

Well, right now I am in my final year undergrad at BITS Pilani and previously..
I have done a 2 month internship at Cateina Technologies, Mumbai as a software developer. I worked on developing a web application in there SHHHHH !!!.
I have also worked as a student researcher at IIIT Delhi (remote (COVID)) under Prof Tavpritesh Sethi, where I worked on deep learning and it's applications in bioinformatics.
I am excited to inform you that I have been offered a full time at Oracle India as an applications engineer, starting August 2021.

Ohh I also had a startup with a couple of my friends, we were developing an application around an OCR pipeline. Alas we had to close it, for reasons known to us SHHHHH !!!

My Hobbies

I am a beginner photographer, I use a Nikon D3500 for shooting photos and to edit photos I use adobe lightroom. I have travelled to couple of places since I started photography as a hobby and I have shot a couple of photos since then.
